blogPost.excerpt:
Get Yourself Some BRAND NEW Theory Wear! ► https://bit.ly/3beM0ys

Theorists, we all know I love a good ARG. And Crow 64? Well, I had to dive in head first. Crow 64 is the ARG of the "unfinished Nintendo 64 game" called Catastrophe Crow. In the original video, we get the history of the game as well as our first playthrough footage. From there, it spread across the internet into a building mystery waiting to be figured out. Today, I am going to try to do just that. 

Check out Adam's Channel ► https://www.youtube.com/user/AdamButcher

Thanks to u/TheNinjaCakes for letting us use their sprite pack! ► https://bit.ly/2LIjaZT

SUBSCRIBE to Catch all the Theories! ► https://goo.gl/kQWHkJ        

Need Royalty Free Music for your Content? Try Epidemic Sound. 
Get A 30 Day Free Trial! ► http://share.epidemicsound.com/MatPat

#Crow64 #CatastropheCrow #Creepypasta #Creepy #Scary #ARG #Nintendo #N64 #MatPat #Theory #GameTheory 
   
More THEORIES: 
FNAF, The FINAL Timeline ►► https://bit.ly/2MlHYFe
FNAF, The Monster We MISSED! ►► https://youtu.be/_ygN8HLCaJg
FNAF This Theory Changes Everything ► https://bit.ly/2JUQUn6
FNAF, You Were Meant To Lose ► https://youtu.be/7bn8hM9k0b0
FNAF 6, No More Secrets ► https://bit.ly/2LVCq4u   

Credits:
Writers: Matthew Patrick and Zach Stewart
Editors: Pedro Freitas, Alex "Sedge" Sedgwick, and Tyler Mascola
Assistant Editor: AlyssaBeCrazy
Sound Editor: Yosi Berman
blogPost.body:
Get Yourself Some BRAND NEW Theory Wear! ► https://bit.ly/3beM0ys

Theorists, we all know I love a good ARG. And Crow 64? Well, I had to dive in head first. Crow 64 is the ARG of the "unfinished Nintendo 64 game" called Catastrophe Crow. In the original video, we get the history of the game as well as our first playthrough footage. From there, it spread across the internet into a building mystery waiting to be figured out. Today, I am going to try to do just that. 

Check out Adam's Channel ► https://www.youtube.com/user/AdamButcher

Thanks to u/TheNinjaCakes for letting us use their sprite pack! ► https://bit.ly/2LIjaZT

blogPost.title: Game Theory: Beware Crow 64 c̸̛̊rO̵̼̮͐̄́̀͘W̴̘̪͈̆ 6̵̓͛͒4̴̈͗̃̋ c̶̾́́̀̑Ȑ̸̲̪̅͘O̶w̵̄̀̆̅̕͝ 6̴̞̓̒̈́̇4̶̩̘͗͌̉

localize.title: 博弈论。Beware Crow 64 c̸̛̊rO̵̼̮͐̄́̀͘W̴̘̪͈̆ 6̵̓͛͒4̴̈͗̃̋ c̶̾́́̀̑Ȑ̸̲̪̅͘O̶w̵̄̀̆̅̕͝ 6̴̞̓̒̈́̇4̶̩̘͗͌̉
localize.description:
给自己买一些全新的Theory Wear! ► https://bit.ly/3beM0ys

理论家们，我们都知道我喜欢好的ARG。那C罗64呢？好吧，我不得不一头扎进去。Crow 64是 "未完成的任天堂64游戏"《大灾变Crow》的ARG。在最初的视频中，我们得到了游戏的历史以及第一次玩耍的片段。从此，它在网络上传播成了一个等待被解开的建筑谜团。今天，我将尝试做到这一点。

请看亚当的频道► https://www.youtube.com/user/AdamButcher

感谢u/TheNinjaCakes让我们使用他们的精灵包! ► https://bit.ly/2LIjaZT

订阅所有理论! ► https://goo.gl/kQWHkJ        

需要免版税的音乐为您的内容？试试Epidemic Sound。
获得30天免费试用! ► http://share.epidemicsound.com/MatPat

#Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 
   
更多的理论。
FNAF, The FINAL Timeline ►► https://bit.ly/2MlHYFe
FNAF，我们错过的怪物! ►► https://youtu.be/_ygN8HLCaJg
FNAF这个理论改变了一切 ► https://bit.ly/2JUQUn6
FNAF，你注定要输 ► https://youtu.be/7bn8hM9k0b0。
FNAF 6, No More Secrets ► https://bit.ly/2LVCq4u   

剧组：
编剧: Matthew Patrick and Zach Stewart Matthew Patrick and Zach Stewart
编辑：Pedro Freitas, Alex "Sedge" Sedgwick, and Tyler Mascola Pedro Freitas, Alex "Sedge" Sedgwick, and Tyler Mascola
助理编辑。AlyssaBeCrazy
声音编辑：Yosi Berman

localize.title: 博弈論。Beware Crow 64 c̸̛̊rO̵̼̮͐̄́̀͘W̴̘̪͈̆ 6̵̓͛͒4̴̈͗̃̋ c̶̾́́̀̑Ȑ̸̲̪̅͘O̶w̵̄̀̆̅̕͝ 6̴̞̓̒̈́̇4̶̩̘͗͌̉
localize.description:
給自己買一些全新的Theory Wear! ► https://bit.ly/3beM0ys

理論家們，我們都知道我喜歡好的ARG。那C羅64呢？好吧，我不得不一頭扎進去。Crow 64是 "未完成的任天堂64遊戲"《大災變Crow》的ARG。在最初的視頻中，我們得到了遊戲的歷史以及第一次玩耍的片段。從此，它在網絡上傳播成了一個等待被解開的建築謎團。今天，我將嘗試做到這一點。

請看亞當的頻道► https://www.youtube.com/user/AdamButcher

感謝u/TheNinjaCakes讓我們使用他們的精靈包! ► https://bit.ly/2LIjaZT

訂閱所有理論! ► https://goo.gl/kQWHkJ        

需要免版稅的音樂爲您的內容？試試Epidemic Sound。
獲得30天免費試用! ► http://share.epidemicsound.com/MatPat

#Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 #Crow64 
   
更多的理論。
FNAF, The FINAL Timeline ►► https://bit.ly/2MlHYFe
FNAF，我們錯過的怪物! ►► https://youtu.be/_ygN8HLCaJg
FNAF這個理論改變了一切 ► https://bit.ly/2JUQUn6
FNAF，你註定要輸 ► https://youtu.be/7bn8hM9k0b0。
FNAF 6, No More Secrets ► https://bit.ly/2LVCq4u   

劇組：
編劇: Matthew Patrick and Zach Stewart Matthew Patrick and Zach Stewart
編輯：Pedro Freitas, Alex "Sedge" Sedgwick, and Tyler Mascola Pedro Freitas, Alex "Sedge" Sedgwick, and Tyler Mascola

next.excerpt:
Welcome to STOCK BOX Season 2! Let’s start of by...well, finishing what we started back in 2019! Gosh, I can’t believe Stock Box took a whole year off. Please enjoy watching the abandoned moth girl doll come together at last!

Go here to vote on the next theme! https://www.poll-maker.com/poll3503925x52ce4092-106
(It seems Youtube removed the 'poll' feature-- Well don't I look silly.)

Catch STOCK BOX Season 1: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwf5az3O7M4c1lbRmvht4tRR88ZWKbYR-

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Materials:
Monster High Doll: Luna Mothews
Water Colored Pencils - Faber Castell
Pastels - Mungyo Hand-Rolled Soft Pastels
Gouache cakes (paint) – Caran D’ache
Sealant - Mr. Super Clear UV Flat by Mr. Hobby (wear a mask and spray in a ventilated area!)
Mask - Organic Vapor Particle Respirator Mask
High Gloss Varnish -Liquitex Brand
Acrylic yarn
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Merchandise: https://www.zazzle.com/store/dollightful/collections
https://society6.com/dollightful
Doll clothing patterns here: https://www.etsy.com/shop/DollightfulPatterns
Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest: @dollightfully
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Musical tracks from Dylan the Druid: https://soundcloud.com/dylan-mccoy-638351878
---
Musical tracks from Artlist https://artlist.io 
Cozy Instrumental Version by Sarah Kang
Hibernate by KOLA 
Hyper Pegasus by Clara Kamil
Flutes Will Chill by Kicktracks
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Logo and other graphics designed by: https://charliesparksdesign.myportfolio.com/

#dollcustomizing #stockbox #ooak
next.title: STOCK BOX Doll Customizing: Luna the abandoned moth doll from before!

localize.title: STOCK BOX娃娃定制。之前被遗弃的飞蛾娃娃Luna!
localize.description:
欢迎来到STOCK BOX第二季! 让我们从......嗯，完成我们在2019年开始的工作开始吧! 天啊，真不敢相信Stock Box竟然休息了一整年。请大家欣赏一下被抛弃的飞蛾女娃娃终于走到了一起!

到这里来为下一个主题投票吧！https://www.poll-maker.com/poll3503925x52ce4092-106。
(看来Youtube删除了 "投票 "功能------好吧，我看起来很傻。)

观看STOCK BOX第一季：https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwf5az3O7M4c1lbRmvht4tRR88ZWKbYR-

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
材料。
"怪物高 "玩偶：Luna Mothews
水彩铅笔 - Faber Castell (Faber Castell)
粉彩 - Mungyo手卷软粉彩
水粉饼（颜料）--卡兰-达什。
密封胶 - Mr.
口罩--有机蒸汽粒子呼吸器口罩
高光泽度清漆-立基达品牌。
腈纶纱线
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
商品：https://www.zazzle.com/store/dollightful/collections
https://society6.com/dollightful
娃娃服装图案这里：https://www.etsy.com/shop/DollightfulPatterns
Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest: @dollightfully
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
德鲁伊迪伦的音乐曲目：https://soundcloud.com/dylan-mccoy-638351878
---
来自艺人的音乐曲目https://artlist.io 
惬意的器乐版：姜芃姬
Hibernate by KOLA 
克拉拉-卡米尔的《超飞马》
笛子会冷由Kicktracks
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
标志和其他图形设计：https://charliesparksdesign.myportfolio.com/
